Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 91st/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston and 91st: due to, street blockage near 91st/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston and 91st: due to, street blockage near 91st/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, 76th, Stony Island and 75th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, 76th, Stony Island and 75th due to street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
